title: Reed leaves LIV Golf to make PGA Tour return
desc: American Patrick Reed announces he is leaving the LIV Golf series to make a return to the PGA Tour, who will allow him to play from August.

title: Vancouver-based Jim Pattison group says it didn’t know warehouse would become ICE facility
desc: The U.S. Department of Homeland Security is in the process of buying a building owned by Jim Pattison Developments to use as an ICE processing facility.

title: Raheem Sterling leaves Chelsea by mutual agreement
desc: Raheem Sterling is a free agent after the forward reached an agreement with Chelsea to end his contact, the club confirmed on Wednesday.

title: EU seafood supply at risk as new Catch certification system falters
desc: European ports are reportedly facing a significant seafood backlog after the EU’s new digital Catch certification system malfunctioned, stranding shipments and disrupting the supply chain.

title: Webb pushes boundaries of observable universe closer to Big Bang
desc: The NASA/ESA/CSA James Webb Space Telescope has topped itself once again, delivering on its promise to push the boundaries of the observable universe closer to cosmic dawn with the confirmation of a bright galaxy that existed 280 million years after the Big Bang.

title: People in Minneapolis share real stories of living with ICE in the streets
